item.title: 3rd Anniversary of my Gmail experience
item.description: Today, it’s 3 years since the day I opened my Gmail account. I remember those days when Gmail was in beta (although it’s still in beta as the Gmail logo says) and signup for a Gmail account was only by invitation. It was like a privilege to have a Gmail account B). Then, came an invitation from my cousin and I became a proud owner of my Gmail account. Gmail gave me a lot of things I always desired from using the e-mail:
